data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 77,300 people living in Puttalam, Sri Lanka. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Puttalam, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 7 believers in Puttalam and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11042 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Puttalam to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Puttalam.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please give the church in the state of Puttalam prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Puttalam, Sri Lanka.
Spirit, teach the 7 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

location.name: Puttalam
location.people_groups_list: Viswakarma, Sri Lanka Chetti, Parsee, Radayo, Baloch
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Viswakarma (7,100), Sri Lanka Chetti (6,200), Parsee (700), Radayo (1,700), Baloch (900)
